param

Class JasFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • param.StateValue
      • param.Function
        • param.JasFunction

  • final class JasFunction
extends Function
    Rational function representation using the Java Algebra System (JAS). Functions are stored in the form num / den. JAS takes care that num and den stay coprime. This decreases the memory needed to represent a function, allows for easier comparism, etc. On the other hand, the cancellation algorithm is expensive. The function factory class used with these functions is JasFunctionFactory.
    Author:
    Ernst Moritz Hahn (University of Oxford)
    See Also:
    http://krum.rz.uni-mannheim.de/jas/, Function, JasFunctionFactory

      • star

        public Function star()
        Description copied from class: Function
        Performs the star operation with this function. The value of the result is equal to 1/(1-this). It might however be represented in a different way than the function which would be obtained if this result were to be computed using subtraction and division.
        Specified by:
        star in class Function
        Returns:
        result of star operation

      • toConstraint

        public Function toConstraint()
        Description copied from class: Function
        Returns a simplified version for constraint checking. The function returned shall be a polynomial which is above/equal to zero for the same parameter valuations as the original function. It might evaluate to different values otherwise. This function is intended to prepare input to constraint solvers, which sometimes cannot handle division and also otherwise perform better when applied to less complex functions.
        Specified by:
        toConstraint in class Function
        Returns:
        simplified form for constraint checking

      • evaluate

        public BigRational evaluate(Point point,
                            boolean cancel)
        Description copied from class: Function
        Evaluate this function at a given point. The point represents an evaluation of the parameters, with values assigned to parameters according to their order as given in the FunctionFactory.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Function
        Parameters:
        point - parameter evaluation to evaluate
        cancel - whether result shall be enforced to be coprime
        Returns:
        value at the given parameter evaluation

      • evaluate

        public BigRational evaluate(Point point)
        Description copied from class: Function
        Evaluate this function at a given point. The point represents an evaluation of the parameters, with values assigned to parameters according to their order as given in the FunctionFactory. The result will be a coprime representation of a rational number.
        Overrides:
        evaluate in class Function
        Parameters:
        point - parameter evaluation to evaluate
        Returns:
        value at the given parameter evaluation
